website_summaries.verdict: Design of this model is lightweight and easy to hold for long work sessions.
pros: Has a trigger lock feature, so you can relax your hand while using it for long periods of time
Sold with a battery, so you can begin using it immediately
Trusted brand name that will give you impressive longevity
cons: Limited to a maximum air speed of 90 miles per hour

customer_reviews.title: Combo is a great value, smaller tube would be better
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of 20v Dewalt tools. They are really fantastic. This blower is a good overall value when purchased with the 5.0 battery and charger. $200 seems expensive, but 5.0 batteries are $100+ and chargers are $30-$50, so as a combo it is a good value. I think the blower is powerful enough for normal homeowners but I do hope they come out with a smaller tube to increase the velocity. It works well for sidewalks and driveways and roads but a smaller diameter tip would make it more useful in grass and bushes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than Black & Decker alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I've used battery-powered hard-surface blowers from Black & Decker for years to blow leaves and dirt off my garage floor, driveway, walks, and patio — first the older non-lithium model, then the lithium ones, and they've always been incredibly useful but underpowered. I thought it just wasn't possible to get more power out of a battery-powered blower. I was wrong. By a lot. This (...I'm so sorry) blows them away. It's not even close. This is incredible. I can't believe I wasted years NOT owning this. If you need this category of product — and if you're a homeowner, you can probably use it — buy this one. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Arment

customer_reviews.title: Blower works Great! Battery sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The blower works great! But the battery died after only three uses. Time to call Dewalt. Update: to Dewalt's credit I was contacted and referred to a repair center. I brought the battery in and they replaced it at no charge since it was under warranty. This second battery lasted for one use of the blower. Then wouldn't hold a charge. I brought it back to the repair center and they once again replaced the battery. Five stars for excellent customer support. I've now used the blower once with this third battery. We'll see if it continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: soak

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The charger won’t charge on the second time of use Apparently it is a common problem There is a video on you tube how to fix however it worked the first time and did not work ever since
customer_reviews.author: Nouri Nass

customer_reviews.title: IT CAN'T WORK IF IT'S BROKEN!
customer_reviews.text: I received a box containing the leaf blower that was obviously opened previously which was covered with tape. I inserted the battery, which was already charged and attempted to use it on my driveway. It worked for less than five minutes and then stopped. I thought the batter might need additional charging but it did not. The product is obviously defective and had been previously returned as defective but they shipped it out to me anyway. This is NO WAY to run a business!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wet leaves + Dewalt blower do not mix
customer_reviews.text: Was so on the fence about purchasing this and going electric. i have all Dewalt tools so it is nice to swap out batteries. That being said this blower does not have the power if you plan on using this past anyhting light duty. I ended up hand raking all my leaves this season and plan on getting a gas blower for next fall. The only reason i did not return is because i will use the battery and charger on my other tools.
customer_reviews.author: peter fabianski

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows
customer_reviews.text: Great for a few minutes. Not what I expected. Maybe a corded version of this blower e more effective. On average the battery lasted about 17 minutes but blowing forced was significantly reduced only after a few minutes. If you get this item: BELIEVE BATTERY WARNING REVIEWS
customer_reviews.author: eD

customer_reviews.title: batteries/machine don't work/hold charge long...new chargers take while to charge
customer_reviews.text: Blower used for blowing 1-dust from patio/inside a garage 2- light weight leaves/pods..each lasted about 15 minutes on separate new batteries... Worked 2 separate days, and quit. Forced to take into Dewalt Service place for repair 25 miles away, and see what is wrong. Will leave 2nd review depending on result.
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Father’s Day gift for my dad. He’s a little older and waited until I came for a visit to try out his gift recently for the first time. Extremely disappointed in this product and the corresponding customer service. The blower did not work and we received a canned response that we’re outside the return time to exchange. How bout you take the product back and inspect it to determine if an exchange is warranted? I guarantee you’ll see this product is brand new and defective. Buyer beware especially of this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McGuire

customer_reviews.title: This blower is WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is WOW! This thing is so freakishly strong That it even blows water. I had a storm not too long ago and this easily pushed all the broken branches and leaf pedals aside.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: More of a light air broom
customer_reviews.text: Light and maneuverable but with only 1/2 the power of my cheap ($69) corded blower. It will blow dry leaves and dust but not anything of any weight like acorns. Think of it as an electric broom that you don't have to push. So I'm keeping my cheap corded blower for the jobs when I need a tool that can really do work. The only real problem with the corded blower is the 100' cord is heavy, take's a while to lay out, is cumbersome when you're blowing leaves off the roof with a ladder and takes a fair amount of work to recoil then put away.
customer_reviews.author: notfishing

customer_reviews.title: Included a dirty used battery / charger
customer_reviews.text: Battery and charger weren't in new packaging, were dirty, and used (see pics taken as soon as I opened package). Battery doesn't hold anywhere close to a full charge. Blower seemed new and works.
customer_reviews.author: Chapman Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without the battery, I bought this for a Christmas gift for my husband. We had to wait 2 weeks to get the battery which came on January 7,2019 from the manufacturer. We charged the battery all night and it only worked 5 minutes. When we charged the battery again it only worked for 30 seconds. I will be returning this product it’s not worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: L Flagg

customer_reviews.title: Baaad Battery
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 Dewalt products in my life. The first product (used for less than a week) had a bad battery to which the retailer just swapped a new one. For comparison, these are the same batteries because they fit each other's chargers. Now this blower is the same thing. I plugged it over night, went to use it the next day. It lasted 5 seconds and died. Another hour later, I turned it on, 5 seconds and it died. WHAT IS WRONG W THEIR BATTERIES??
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the battery!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good deal and one of the newer brushless model blowers. Nothing bad to say about the company who sold this but DeWalt has to do something about their batteries. I FULLY charged the battery and it only lasted 12 mins on full throttle and started losing power by 8 min mark. I called DeWalt and they sent me a 2020 battery(It came with a 2019) and the same thing happened with the 2020. Don't understand how two brand new 5ah batteries can only give you 10-12 mins non-stop power. I would have given this a higher rating if the battery lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: MeLLLL

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Blower Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blower not know how powerful, light weight, and versatile it was. It's great! It uses the same batteries that my DeWalt drill and recip. saw do. I love the fact that it has a stand at its base, so it does not tip over. Other manufacturers' similar products do not have a stand and are always falling over. I have been waiting for this blower to be released for a long time. I don't have to worry about cords, fuel mixtures/mess, and fouled spark plugs. I would recommend this blower to any and everyone. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cisne Grande

customer_reviews.title: Good Wall Decoration
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to purchase. I was okay with the less than stellar air movement as I was only wanting to blow clear a 12 x 12 patio after edging and blow fertilizers off the sidewalk. Well today I finally got a chance to try this out as the weather has been horrible. Talk about disappointment, if the grass had ANY moisture to it this blower could not move it. This product is great for blowing out your garage vice sweeping and not a whole heck of a lot else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: this blower does fine for smaller jobs, which is what I got it for. I would not want to blow the entire yard with it, but for the carport and sidewalks after a lawn mow it does great. Much easier than dragging a cord around. Overall I am happy with it, and most all Dewalt tools.
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used gas blowers for years for everything from leaves and branches to dirt and cleaning gutters, and I was skeptical of the power from a cordless. I've found this unit is great for small jobs, but haven't yet tried it on larger tasks. I like the light weight and the quick on/off, so I find I use it more often because it's so easy. The 5 amh battery seems to have power for multiple uses before recharging.
customer_reviews.author: G. Targee

customer_reviews.title: With two of these, you could be a ninja blowing master
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. For the weight, battery size, and ease of use, I would say this would top or tie on my list of best Dewalt purchases I have made. I'd almost rather have two of these than the back pack blower that I purchased from Dewalt, and that thing is also pretty darn good, but overall with two of these, you can get a lot more done without the weight and restriction on blowing direction that the backpack version has. I am very likely to buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gdad

customer_reviews.title: Light & Powerful - LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We love this blower! So much more convenient than our corded one when cleaning around our pool area. Works perfectly! My only complaint - although very minor - is that the fully charged battery doesn't last longer. It's totally adequate for our purposes, but needs recharging after 15 minutes or so. That's assuming it is not going continuously, full speed. It does charge relatively quickly & it's so lightweight we wouldn't want a heavier, bulky battery! We love the product, but just wanted to let you know of any potential drawback. Also - you can always purchase an extra battery so if you need more time, just pull out your extra battery and your blowing won't be interrupted!
customer_reviews.author: LCPI 02130

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a battery operated device. Has lots of power, it would have gotten 5 stars if they gave me a tube that was smaller at the end, which would have increased the power and velocity of the unit. I bet they will make one for it eventually, but I already purchased it and will not have that luxury when they realize that would increase its power. It is not a bad unit overall ...
customer_reviews.author: Cousin Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and a Time Saving Blower
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to get another gas blower and went with the Dewalt blower with the battery. I already have another Dewalt tool with the 20V 5ah and that would allow me to rotate the battery during the charging. After years trying to rake the leaves at the rock garden, driveway, and walkway it was so much faster with the blower. I was able to do more and spend less time in those areas. Battery life is good with the variable speed. I didn't really have an issues with the battery as I have another spare 20V 5AH battery. If you don't have a second battery I would recommend getting the blower with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller - defective product and refused to refund
customer_reviews.text: This order has been a disaster. The item arrived defective - simply did not turn on. We send it in for return - we have to pay for shipping. The seller then sends us the item back and makes us pay to pick it up. Now we have this item we bought from them that never worked and never will work, having paid $60 in extra shipping fees. Any contact has been non-responsive and when they responded they refused to do anything. PLEASE FIX!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: charger and battery stopped working in less than a year same price as online!!! Go to Home depot! $99. Later bought a new charger with spare battery from Home Depot, could have gotten a return from HD!
customer_reviews.author: denise K. mascari

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as I thought, even with tennis elbow.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been dealing with tennis elbow, was worried, but really didn’t bother it at all. When you have it on it almost feels lighter. I love not having to deal with gas, changing oil. My yard is fairly small but it accumulates weeds and leaves and needles. I got the 20v 5ah did my whole roof 2600sqft, should of been up there sooner but got this leaf blower yesterday. Definitely will hit the roof more often, ha as I was walking up to the peak with the tube point back it acted as a jet pack lol. I have another 20v 4ah battery, I was able to blow the deck off, clear the driveway and some spots in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Many uses around the home front, just not that good for leaves!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought to blow the leaves to the curb so my Billings can pick them up. It works ok for that. The 5 ah battery that comes with it only lasts about 20-25 minutes. It’s great for blowing clippings off the sidewalk and driveway or for blowing the sidewalk clear of newly fallen fluffy snow but for leaves, not so much. You could do it but it’d take all day and several high amp hour batteries. I’ll just have to make use of it in some other capacity rather than the one I bought it for. No biggie. I’ve used the battery in other dewalt tools. Gives the other batteries I have a chance to charge up!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: A powerful leaf blower for everyday use to clear driveways, get debris out of the bushes, or make leaf piles. Not too loud and not too heavy. The 5 amp 20 volt battery lasts me about 20 minutes. I'll use a Flex Volt battery if I use the blower for longer periods. It's a great tool to add to your Dewalt arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: desdet

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding lightweight, powerful  Blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this years ago!! Really like using this blower. I use it on every thing from blowing out the back of my truck bed, garage, rain gutters, riding lawn mower, and of course leaves. I'm almost sixty and I thought I didn't mind raking and sweeping until I started using this blower. It's reduced the time to 1/4....Plus it's fun and easy. Bought the 5 amp battery due to all I have is 1 1/2 and 3 amp battery packs.
customer_reviews.author: Durango43

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull battery operated blower
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product for keeping the patio, walks, porch, outdoor lawn furniture, driveway, etc. clean. I was tired of using my electric blower and this has eliminated the electrical cord and slightly heavier blower. Only once did I run out of battery power and have had no other problem running the blower for my needs. I am impressed. The blower has enough power to blow pine needles and dry leaves from my grass.
customer_reviews.author: AmSue

customer_reviews.title: SOLID DEPENDABLE DEWALT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life. Good power for residential use. Only suggestion would be that the blower tube be an inch or so narrower in diameter so that the blast could be more controlled in tight spaces. If an add-on accessory were available it would be a perfect solution. This is the consistently dependable quality of all Dewalt products. The only reason for the four star rating is the blower tube size which because we live in a patio home no doubt presents a more noticeable issue than would use in more standard sized yards.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Adams

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Light and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Easily cleared off our decks of fallen tree bark and small branches with the concentrator nozzle. Leaves and other debris were obviously no challenge either. Really happy with its weight, or rather, lack thereof. I was not expecting it to be as light as it was. It was also much quieter than the Ryobi we had been using. I really liked not having to hold down a button to keep the thing running and it sticking to the variable speed I set it was a boon too. Completely happy with the purchase. I think my Gardner is envious...
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 75 year old woman who is responsible for removing a ton of leaves. Raking them is almost impossible, and I was mowing and bagging the leaves, but 2 passes and the bagger was full. Then I noticed someone blowing all those leaves. After doing my research, I decided on this Dewalt model, and I'm in love. This baby is like a cyclone moving my leaves to the back of our property. Now if I could just figure out how to get all the leaves off the tree at once, so I don't have to keep repeating the process, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J Greene

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent a bad battery, will not replacebsttery, have to return everything!!
customer_reviews.text: Blower works great, exactly what I'd expect from a dewalt product. Unfortunately I got a bad battery, wont hold a charge for more than 15 minutes, tried another charger and even left it charging for 3 days to no avail. Waiting to hear back from the seller. Will update. Update: do not purchase anything from this company. They will not replace the battery. I have to send back everything, blowet, battery and charger and get a complete replacement. This is unacceptable. I wouldgladly return the battery as they are very expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Therese M Brady

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this blower for home owners.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. I looked at the more powerful 60V blower, but after watching some reviews on YouTube, I decided this would be perfectly fine for my home. I am able to easily clean out my garage and shed with this unit. It is powerful enough to certainly blow leaves off my driveway as well as assist with putting down pinestraw. I love that you can vary the speed with the trigger as opposed to all on or all off. I am coming from a corded blower which has more power than this, but this is SO much easier to use in so many ways. Very happy with this purchase. Always had good luck with DEWALT tools.
customer_reviews.author: djwtarheel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad who does a lot of gardening at home. He was a bit apprehensive at first, but after trying it out he loved it! He says it has enough power and is super comfortable to hold. His favorite feature is the trigger control for air flow. You can gradually increase power by squeezing harder. He loves this and it really helps to blow leaves out of his planter beds without blowing all of the soil out too! He is also satisfied with the length of charge. He usually uses for 15-30 minutes and has never run out of a charge.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box as I had some blowing to do, so I thought I would try this out. I tried to put a 60v battery in it but it did not fit. I then installed a Dewalt 6 AH battery fully charged in it. The blower did not blow very hard I was immediately disappointed, then it discharged that battery in about 15 minutes. I feel like I've been duped. This product should sell for about $49 if your just blowing off small deck it should be fine but other than that its just not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: James Ryan Kuzilik

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard surfaces less than 1,000 sq ft
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Azec deck that gets stained easily from oak tree leafs. Love my Azec deck but light color stains too easily from tree leafs. Was to much of a hassle to break out the backpack blower every other day. This does a good job and extremely convenient so blow off deck in minutes. Even have blown out the garage and driveway with it. Not powerful enough for yard work. Only reason for 4 stars is cost is high for power. Still, great for decks, garage, etc.
customer_reviews.author: waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Simple, Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how effective this blower would be, but took a chance simply because I was tired of dealing with the extension cord on my Craftsman blower. The DeWalt is rated with a speed less than half of my corded blower, but it is sooo much better. It is much more versatile, much simpler, much faster, and somehow has even more blowing power than my corded model. It easily gets me through cleanup after mowing my 1/3 acre lawn and still has plenty of juice for knocking spider webs down and blowing out the garage. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Powerful with excellent build quality, mediocre battery life
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction as I've come to expect from DeWalt. I have no doubt it will last for years. I don't have anything to compare with as this is my first leaf blower, but it seems pretty powerful, even blowing 1" rocks off my driveway. My only complaint is the battery life could be better. I can barely clear my 400 ft driveway before having to recharge. Luckily I also bought the 20v hedge trimmer so I have an extra battery. The trimmer, by the way, runs forever on a charge! Overall I'd still recommend this blower for light duty applications. The Milwaukee is probably better, but it's also twice the price and probably overkill for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Canon man 123

customer_reviews.title: GET THE 60v FLEXVOLT  INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: I really have no complaints about this unit but did have an opportunity to compare it to the 60v version and for the price , Really is no comparison . This 20v version is decent but lacks that extra umpth to really push leaves around and round up the dust comparable to a gas unit or what I’m used to . I bought this actually to dry my car touch less and really doesn’t do the job as expected . Likely sell this one and get the 60v flexvolt version with 120mph rating .
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyDoo

customer_reviews.title: Blower Tube Falls Off
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this product EXCEPT the blower tube keeps falling off. It will be latched in and then it falls off a few minutes later. If this is a design defect, plan on returning it. But if it is just getting a bad one, I will exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Yong

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: No more uncoiling or tripping over extension cords! No more looking for a handy outlet. Just slip in the battery and you are ready to go! Lightweight, handy and versitile. I used to dread sweeping the deck and moving furniture to clean it off. Not any more! Push a button and we are ready for company. I chose Dewalt because the battery is interchangable with my other Dewalt tools. I haven't tried the drying power as it hasn't rained lately, but it does a fast job of removing grass and leaves on the sidewalk after mowing the yard.
customer_reviews.author: nbs

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY, IT'S JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several months for a newly purchased home I have yet to move into. I have had the battery fully charged since delivery, went to use the blower for the first time........hardly any power and after 15 or seconds it would wind down and stop only to start again by pulling the trigger. I will never purchase anything made by DeWalt and recommend others not to do so as well.
customer_reviews.author: charles jensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and amazing value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic materials and craftsmanship, as well as design and ease of use. Unbeatable value with 5.0 battery and charger included! Huge savings! Design is incredibly efficient when compared to comparable Milwaukee blowers on the market when you consider that you get roughly 20 minutes on high running a 5.0 battery with this, whereas you get roughly 10 minutes when running a 5.0 battery with a Milwaukee 18V.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: but the performance is much better than other (mostly green) blowers that I've used in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a dozen battery powered blowers, and this one knocks the socks off the rest. First of all, if you're using a corded or a gas powered leaf blower today, do yourself a favor and just bite the bullet. Battery powered, cordless leaf blowers make such a massive difference, you'll thank yourself for years to come. This one happens to use the same batteries and chargers as my power tools, so it's an added bonus, but the performance is much better than other (mostly green) blowers that I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cody D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blower!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally sold on the Dewalt 20V Lithium Ion XR brushless line of products. This blower was my first! It’s fantastic inside the house/garage and outside. I can blow for at least 40 minutes on a 5Ah battery pack charge, plenty of time to do the deck, patio, front porch, driveway, and entire sidewalk. This far exceeded my expectations, and no fuss with 2 cycle oil/fuel. No smell. No maintenance. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Electric Blower Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quality electric blower then you have found it with this Dewalt product. It is simple to use and easy to operate. It was a snap to assemble and lightweight to carry around. The battery does come somewhat charged, but does need a full day to charge to be really affective. We are a Dewlt family and will continue to be with this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ignatiev

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my mom to blow her porches clear rather than sweeping with a broom (which she seemed to do daily) She's still sweeping (likes the exercise) but my dad is finding all sorts of uses for it from cleaning out the gutters to the driveway to clearing leaves from bushes to clearing sawdust. Very nice to have a small portable tool like this that doesn't require gas/maintenance/starting etc... My family has a host of dewalt tools so battery life is not important as there are others to change out but you can expect about 10-15 minutes of blowing on a full battery.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Popovich

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the 15 minute battery life. $200.00 unit and you only get 15 minutes on a charge. I thought maybe just because it was the first use. I charged the battery again and the indicators on the pack had shown a full charge, so out I went. Same thing. I had this blower less than 24 hours and it was back in the box and returned. Maybe that is what Is expected out of all makes and models. Not for me for that kind of coin.
customer_reviews.author: James Winning

customer_reviews.title: Battery failure in 11 months, replacement... battery arrived :) Blower works fine so far.
customer_reviews.text: Blower works well, I have no issue so far with that. Battery however failed in 11 months. Now I have to go through the hassle of seeing if the manufacture will replace the $63.00 battery. Not the quality I expect/need. Okay, update so far very responsive, said will replace battery in 7 to 10 days...stay tuned, battery arrived and blower works very well again. Happy ending, yes. Will give fours stars, but trust shaken.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for my wife's use cleaning off the deck - we live next to woods and she hates starting a gas blower. We like the way it stands on end and takes up little space. Not a good choice for clearing the yard, but for the deck and drying the car it is great. Already have a few Dewalt 20V batteries for power tools, so we did not have to invest in any new batteries and chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It's technically the ONLY one I've ever owned but I am very happy with it. I've used several leaf blowers in my day and even though this one is battery powered, it is hands down the most powerful I've used. I actually bought it in case I went to a protest and the cops shot tear gas at us, but I'm sure it has more standard domestic uses as well. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job that I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blow leaves off of the mulch in my front yard and am happy with it's performance. It is light weight and has sufficient air flow for my purpose. It does not move as much air as blowers which use higher voltage batteries and will not replace my regular corded blower. I have DeWalt tools and using the same batteries was a major factor in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mlat

customer_reviews.title: Good second blower.
customer_reviews.text: It is as good as possible be - a battery powered blower. Our number 1 blower is a corded for heavy wet stuff. For every day cleanup around the draway this is the blower that we are using. Don't expect more from a battery powered unit. Plenty of airflow, 400 cfts; that what you need not the speed for everyday use. For wet stuff, yes you need the speed also, - a corded one- but that is overblowing the leafs in dry days to the neighbors, and we are just chasing the leafs from everywhere to recollect them.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this blower a month ago and this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blower a month ago and this is the first DeWalt product that I am very unhappy with. The battery is very inconsistent and the blower power is very inconsistent. A charging will sometimes last 5 minutes and other times it will last longer. The most time I get out of a charging is 30 minutes. This is also the first time I had contact with DeWalt customer service and they were not helpful at all. It's a hassle finding a box to send it back to Amazon with so it's just disappointing all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T in TX

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas and have used it a couple of times and want one for myself now. It has plenty of power for blowing leaves and pine needles and is just so easy to use. I used it for 30 minutes straight in a single use with no issue. The battery is amazing. It is not as strong as a big backpack blower, but for most jobs it will do everything you need and it's so clean and easy to use. I highly recommend it and want one for my house too!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Very effective- Long Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I use this item to clean up after some jerk squirrels that live at my house. They leave their nuts everywhere without any regard for anyone else. They are just so rude. Ok, so the blower and 5 amp battery worked great and I got over an hour of continual use time. I was done, but the battery still had a bar left. Those squirrels will not be allowed to win. Thank you Dewalt for arming me in this good fight.
customer_reviews.author: Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Life changer! Always handy and ready to blow!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best blower I've used. Best points: * Cordless * Uses the same battery as the rest of my shop tools * Throttle lock holds the perfect speed, trigger instantly increases power for that stubborn leaf then returns to set speed. * Sets flat on the ground and does not roll over * Battery WELL protected inside base * Super quiet on low setting which is usually sufficient for leaves or Dog hair on concrete * The 5 Ah batteries usually last through multiple uses, the small ones are more or less good for a medium sized area and then back on the charger they go
customer_reviews.author: Glare

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick clean up
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time so...found it to be very light weight, so great tool if you do not have strong upper body. That made it easy to manipulate. The only draw-back is the battery life (didn't quick get my front yard which is about 1/8 acre with lots of fall leaves). I had only charged it once, so hoping the second charge last a little longer. I will buy a second battery for sure. It's light weight and easy use will make it easy to quickly grab for chores around the house and I would recommend for that for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The big bad wolf would be jealous of this blowers puffs
customer_reviews.text: Another awesome 20v tool from Dewalt. It's a really nice blower and looks really sharp. The variable speed locking trigger is nice so you don't have to hold it down the whole time your using it. The 5ah battery lasts a long time and has a indicator on it to show you how much battery life you have left.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Returned for battery issue
customer_reviews.text: Generally we liked the performance, power, light weight, & maneuverability. However the battery, once fully discharged would not recharge. ( A fault mentioned in other reviews) Also it had a mechanical issue with the latch making the battery hard to remove. Note that extra batteries are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This device is perfect for my needs. After mowing, I hated pulling out my corded blower... It was such a hassle, and lengthened the mowing process to such a degree that I usually just didn't use it. A battery powered blower gets me through the entire clean-up job after mowing, even on a smaller battery (1.5 ah). For anything bigger, though, like fall leaves, you'll want the bigger batteries Dewalt makes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ward

customer_reviews.title: For a rechargeable, very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Having used other earlier, rechargeable tools, I expected a feeble attempt at a leaf blower, especially a 20 volt one. I was pleasantly surprised--this unit packs quite a punch, such that you can feel it pushing back at you. Perhaps the air speed isn't as high as other blowers, but the air volume is huge. I had no problem cleaning wet leaves off the driveway; something that's challenging even for a corded blower. So far, the battery capacity will get me about 20 minutes to half-hour--not outstanding, but adequate for my 220 foot long driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck(G)

customer_reviews.title: Petite & powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love tools! I got this blower to keep my backyard clean. I have a large juniper tree that constantly drops little things. Sweeping just wasn’t doing it. This little guy is what I needed. It is not heavy & powerful like the gas powered blowers but it is light weight fir this little old lady. I clean my little yard every morning then enjoy a nice cup of coffe & a pastry. Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta Zee

customer_reviews.title: Too weak and battery is not that strong to do the job
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappoited with dewalt this time. I have many products under thjs brand and this is not working at all for me. The battery last around 25-30 mins consistently blowing and could not do much of its blowing power. Returning it now
customer_reviews.author: Phat Dang

customer_reviews.title: Wish the Battery Life is longer
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight compared to the gas blowers I used in the past. Enough power for what I need. Does a good job. Speed can be adjusted, but I end up using the max speed and the battery needs recharging after about 30 to 40 mins. The battery strength indicator on the battery itself is a useful feature to check. Lets me check before starting the work. A spare battery is expensive. If someone has several Dewalt appliances, might be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sander

customer_reviews.title: Great for Truckers
customer_reviews.text: Hubby was so tired of sweeping out the 53' trailer that we got one of these. We charged it up at home and took it on the road with us. He used it today and it worked great! Only thing he noticed is that it may not re-charge with the inverter. If that's the case we'll charge it up in a drivers lounge somewhere. Update. Hubby has used it 5 times to blow out trailer and it hasn't needed to be re-charged yet. So I think he's used it about 20 minutes of total time. Delighted! Should have got one of these years ago 😄
customer_reviews.author: Phantompoodle

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This blower is wonderful. I don't have very strong upper body strength and was concerned that I would get exhausted using this. But not at all. It is light but sturdy. Blowing very powerful and last long enough to do my lengthy driveway plus more. Since my yard is entirely covered by trees I have a lot of leaves! I now keep this compact little blower in the laundry room so I can just step out onto the porch and blow the leaves... no muss no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefishlover

customer_reviews.title: Blow me away good
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful sweeper. It compliments my other Dewalt tools, using the same voltage batteries. It makes driveway and garage cleaning fun and quick. Works well with leaves. I like the variable speed trigger. Yellow jacket colors lets me get in close to those buggers chomping on fallen pears so I can blast them away without them knowing what hit them. lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Just got my DeWalt 20V 5Ah brushless blower, first test run works great 90mph is good enough for yard work I don’t see the need for an expensive gas powered professional model the kind landscapers use that may be very powerful but are annoyingly loud. The DeWalt is very quite and will not disturb your neighbors when you are outside on a Saturday morning blowing leafs around. The blower is also light weight and very easy to use, very satisfied with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Yannucci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yard tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Super easy to assemble (literally two pieces and a battery) and extremely light. I blew out my entire leaf-filled garage in just a few minutes. Surprisingly powerful for a battery powered blower. If you like batter powered tools, you might jump over and buy the blower/trimmer package.
customer_reviews.author: Bregan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on What it is Designed For...
customer_reviews.text: The in no way will replace any decent plugged in model. That being said I am not disappointed in the ability for this to use around the yard for quick blowing. It will blow away loose items with no issues. It does eat the battery in a quick way so suggest to have at least two batteries to get the job done. If you use more than two batteries I want your house because it's too big!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hemmi06

customer_reviews.title: The 5 ah battery lasted only 10 months
customer_reviews.text: The blower work great for 10 months then the $75 5 ah battery died completely. It will not even try to charge. I verified the charger with another battery. I notified Dewalt and they sent me a replacement battery within a week, so I changed my 2 star to a 5 star. This was the first time I had an issue with a Dewalt battery, they usually last me at least 7 yrs..
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Chek

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed. Replaced my dead gas powered blower and is so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive to buy this because it is battery powered. I have a normal house with a front yard and a back yard. I really just need a blower to clean up after I mow. This has more than enough power to do this and still have tons of battery left when I'm done. It replaced my gas blower that needed more repair than it was worth. The best thing is that it just works. Unlike my gas blower where I had to fight it every time I needed it to start up and run the whole time I needed it. BRAVO.
customer_reviews.author: WBC

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a blower for the back deck to blow off leaves and debris. I didn’t want her to have to use a gas powered blower so I wanted to give this a try. She loves it! It’s light weight easy to maneuver and has plenty of power. Very happy with the purchase. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good tool - good power - balanced weight -auto-lock switch is nice
customer_reviews.text: I like Dewalt products and this didn’t disappoint. This has good power and works great on big dry leaves - really has good power. Too soon for me to comment on battery life but I’ve used Dewalt power tools forever so I don’t expect big issues. If you own any other Dewalt, those batteries may already fit this blower
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged, the battery fully discharged in 15 minutes. It's good for a Chicago city lot - a postage stamp. It's absolutely worthless for a suburban lot. I feel like DeWalt puts this product out so the can sucker you into buying 5 batteries, which probably wouldn't be enough to clear my third of an acre. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blower is a real workhorse. Good power and easy to use. Batteries last about 30 minutes on full which is good considering the load. Happy the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Malone

customer_reviews.title: I just love the fact that I can go out any time ...
customer_reviews.text: We've have a corded blower and a wrap around deck. I finally got tired of dragging the cord around and bought this lithium battery operated blower. I just love the fact that I can go out any time I want and quickly blow off my deck especially now when our kitty loves laying at our bedroom door grooming herself. I wake to find clumps of fur everywhere. It takes a couple of minutes to go out and blow the mess away. Also, I am a 72 year old women with limited strength due to a bad shoulder and this blower is easily handled.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bigger than it looked on the website. It's big and powerful. But can be weirded with one hand. I love this thing. Charged it initially and have been using it around the house. It is super powerful. Takes seconds to completely clean patios and paths. Much quieter than gas powered. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Not a replacement for a gas blower.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, but poor performance compared to gas blower. Will blow lightweight items like grass clippings and dry leaves, but not heavier debris like wet leaves, bark, gravel, or sand. Battery seems to last around 15-20 minutes of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I don’t what people are complaining about, but this thing is absolutely awesome! I need to admit I haven’t owned a gas powered blower before, but this things is increasingly powerful. The 5AH battery is enough for me to clean my backyard and the sidewalk in front of the house on when fully charged. My lot is 5000SF.
customer_reviews.author: Ave

customer_reviews.title: nice, strong, relatively quiet blower
customer_reviews.text: This is lighter than my other one using a cord, much more convenient to move around with, and I can do more frequent quick cleanups because it's not so burdensome to take out and get the 100 foot cord unkinked. It is powerful enough for a garden with lots of leaf debris and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austenblue

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blow debris off my combines at the end of the day. I carry DeWalt 20 volt tools and batteries in my truck so it's a good fit to have this. I can blow off 2 combines with it and still have power left. It's not as powerful as the sthil gas powered blower I was using but it does the job and is way more convenient. It's also handy to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: DDV

customer_reviews.title: Gets a Big Job Done for Me
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job: 300 feet of driveway, my part of the cul de sac, all in the woods, plus my front walk, porch, deck and a gravel path around my yard, through our woods and gardens. Got tired of three 100 foot extension cords. Did not want another gas powered tool. Now it is easy to keep up with leaves, even wet ones, before the job gets too big. 25 minutes on high; almost an hour if I do not use high speed where it is not needed. Gets the job done. Recharges fairly quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for leaves and drying hair
customer_reviews.text: Are you in a hurry? No time for rakes or your girlfriend's tiny under-powered hair dryer? Your problems are solved. I was using a push broom to clean off my deck before I found this, but that is no longer the case, and I am never looking back. It runs at full force for about 15 minutes on the battery, so if you got a lot of leaves or a lot of hair, get a second battery bruh
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: Price is worth battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller one thinking that it was actually the bigger one. That one works fine for inside the garage or a worktable. This one works good for outside use his. Since the battery alone will cost about 100 bucks I figured how can I go wrong when you get a charger in a 5 V battery
customer_reviews.author: aaluck

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to put together and the battery just snaps into place. The downside is, even after hours of charging the battery only lasts for about 15 mins of actual usage. If you have a big job to do then there is a lot of stopping and waiting and restarting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical before my purchase but the reviews encouraged me to get this. I’ve been very happy with it and it’ll likely lead to the purchase of a hedge trimmer and string trimmer next. I will say that it doesn’t move quite the air that my old corded blower does but the convenience and handling more than outweigh that. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: EXACTY WHAT I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: Powerful enough for most jobs. Works well with dry leaves, debris. Ideal for quick cleanup. Light weight, well balanced and good run-time. No, it's not as powerful as a gas, or corded blower, but that's fine... its convenience more than makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the typical homeowner
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I use it to blow off the side walks and drive way along with "clean up" from carpentry projects. I haven't run the battery down in a single use, most of these tasks probably take less than 5 minutes of actual run time. I have even gone down my 100' driveway with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to clear his parking lot off at his business. It does not have the power some of the other Commercial grade ones have. (We were also looking at the Husquavarna) However very satisfied with the quality for the price plus we can use the battery for his other power tools. Great battery life, good power. Half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I have a backpack gas blower but need my hubby to start it and put on my back. I wanted this one so I could do small jobs like the front sidewalk and backyard areas where we constantly get debris from cedar and pines trees. This is the perfect solution! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Reddick

customer_reviews.title: Great Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don't have to rake or sweep anymore leaves. I live in the Daniel Boone National Forest and I got leaves lol. This has saved me time and labor. I clear a lot of leaves and area with one charge. I recommend this blower. My research has it at number 1 for it's size and cost. It was better than what I expected. 99% of my Dewalt products haven't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my electric blower. I was tired of fighting that extension cord. This was a great decision. The power and extraordinary battery life are excellent. I run the primary battery for 20-25 minutes and replace with my standard DW pwr tool battery that will run it for 5 minutes. Recharging the primary only takes 15 minutes. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Very short run time/battery life.
customer_reviews.text: On a fully charged battery, only had six-minutes of run time using various speeds. Unacceptable for a $200 leaf blower. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Sinatra fan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No cords to worry about tripping over and light weight for all 5ft 2in of me. I might also mention that Im 78 years old and find this very easy on my joints and back. The only drawback is that I so wish the battery would last a bit longer. All said I love my blower for clearing driveway and blowing leaves. The best product for the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kieffer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Good power. Great battery life. Comes with just one large tube. There are no other attachments. Love the switch that keeps it running without pressing the button. It took me a little bit to get used to - the motor has a tendency to suck in your shirt so you have to hold it away from your body when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Battery would not hold a charge. It last literally 3 minutes. Sent the item back. Extremely hesitant it but any other Dewalt cordless products.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

product_meta.title: DEWALT DCBL720P1 20V MAX 5.0 Ah Lithium Ion XR Brushless Blower, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Style:Gen 1DEWALT DCBL720P1 20V Max Lithium Ion XR Brushless blower (5.0 Ah) uses an innovative axial fan design that maximizes on air output & run time. The variable speed trigger & speed lock give the user maximum control of the blower, with performance up to 400 cu' Per Min of air volume providing & 90 mph of air speed. This blower features a lightweight & ergonomic design (7.1 lbs.), along with low noise performance (61 dB). Includes: DCBL720 blower, 20V Max 5Ah Lithium Ion battery, charger.
feature_bullets: Brushless Motor maximizing motor efficiency and durability
Innovative axial fan design that maximizes on air output and run time
Variable trigger and speed lock. Lightweight and ergonomic design maximizes control and minimizes stress on your arm
Includes 20V MAX 5.0Ah Lithium Ion Battery, along with charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,284 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
